name: QRift
short_description:
QRift is a multiplatform modular Toolkit/Game Engine predominantly written in C++ and also available in C#, based on OpenGL 4 and compatible to older versions.

The modular design allowes users among the source code to choose from a varity range of modules to be set up the core module. This makes it possible to adapt the engine to every task and product so QRift can be used as Toolkit or full supported Game Engine.
The product itself is predominantly written in C++ what means that the core module(s) are native code but is also available in C# and will have an own CLR included in future versions.

We use OpenGL 4 and downwards to be the main API and a modified version of glsl named glx Shading, comprehensive Texture and Multitexture support and an open core design to publish more convenience to users an developers.

Available on Windows PC.
Linux, Mac, Playstation and Nintendo support coming in the future.
summary: A multiplatform modular Toolkit/Game Engine based on C++ and OpenGL
